title: Irreversible Damage
description: With their past behind them and a baby on the way, life for Brady and Tori is finally on track. That is, until tragedy divides them. Unable to cope, Tori moves to Minnesota to be with her parents. Heartbroken and alone, Brady throws himself into his music. His career takes off and Tori assumes Brady left her behind.After a chance run in with Bradyâ€™s brother, Tug, Tori makes a decision. One that leads to Irreversible Damage.
author: K.J. Bell
